title: Medison presskonferense, Stockholm 070801 (SWEDISH)

Det hela ÃƒÂ¤r mycket roande/skrÃƒÂ¤mmande dÃƒÂ¥ Medisons VD gÃƒÂ¶r det ena otroliga uttalandet efter det andra. Saker som framkommer:

ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Their competition uses about 50-60% of their budget on advertising.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Competitors have contacted them and want to collaborate.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The press conference was delayed because Valdi had to go to Copenhagen and have an important meeting with UNICEF.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The other persons in Medison are not really hired; they are just on vacation from their normal jobs in the furniture business and military.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Vista is no problem, you just need more RAM.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ There is no risk of having the same name as another multinational company according to their legal councils.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The company doesn&#039;t have any economical assets.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The reason that they didn&#039;t believe that this would become so big is because they only announced the product and website to a small local website at first.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The reason that the project started is that their CEO didn&#039;t have any income in Brazil and needed some way to gain money.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ They are still in negotiations with logistics and service organizations, even that the first computers will be delivered the coming weeks.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ VAT is supposed to be paid by Medison.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ In total contrast to what 2CO says, Medison says that they are the sellers and only using 2CO as a payment provider. They claim that contract is between the consumers and Medison Europe Limited and NOT 2CO.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ The reason they chose Fedora is that they hasnÃƒÂ¢??t looked at the alternatives and doesn&#039;t know anything about them. They may change Linux distribution in the future if any company behind the distributions wants to pay for it.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Medison only have "virtual offices" since they are so few.
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ He is dead serious about running for prime minister. He will do this without being part of a political party and he will do this as soon as possible. It&#039;s important to note that this isn&#039;t an answer forced by the journalists; he talks in detail about it.
